main event: Three witnesses reported seeing an unusual aerial object in Hardinsburg, Kentucky on June 29, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a bright glow and steady lights around its perimeter., It hovered and maneuvered for approximately 30 to 45 minutes., Witnesses reported the object was silent and at an altitude of 1,000 to 2,000 feet., The report was investigated by Project Blue Book officials., The conclusion was that the object was most likely a high-altitude balloon.
sighted object: round object with bright glow and lights
